definition: to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.english: The only room available at the moment is a suite.
This is the opulence of the twin suites layout… a temple of your supreme status.
sentences.chinese: 豪华双套房设计，彰显豪迈气派，倍添矜贵身价。

sentences.english: It is crowned by a rooftop terrace with an outdoor saltwater swimming pool.
sentences.chinese: 整个套房由带有海水游泳池的天台环绕。

sentences.english: She quickly regretted the decision and locked him out of their honeymoon suite.
sentences.chinese: 随后，简很快反悔，并把自己锁在了蜜月套房里头。

sentences.english: Residents are also welcome to order meals from local restaurants to enjoy in-suite.
sentences.chinese: 居民也欢迎到当地餐馆点菜享受套房。

sentences.english: Wearing a bikini, Sara tries to get Scuderi to take her to his suite.
sentences.chinese: 莎拉穿着比基尼，勾引史古德利，试图进入他的套房。

sentences.english: They are in suite 705. Let me phone him.
sentences.chinese: 他们住在705号套房，我来给他打电话。

sentences.english: Jocelyn: A superior room, with twin beds.
sentences.chinese: 一间高级套房，要有两张单人床。

sentences.english: I'd like to take a suite with lake view. What's the rate for it?
sentences.chinese: 我要一间可以眺望湖景的套房。每天收费多少？

sentences.english: Keith returns to the hotel suite.
Are you after a stylish room or spacious suite?
sentences.chinese: 你是一个时尚的后室或宽敞的套房？

sentences.english: VIP suite with luxury facilities in a star-rated hotel.
sentences.chinese: 普通人住不起五星级饭店的总统套房。

sentences.english: A variety of studio flats cater for different needs.
sentences.chinese: 多款开放式套房间隔迎合不同需要。

sentences.english: I'd like to reserve a roomette.
sentences.chinese: 我想在火车上预订一间套房。

sentences.english: So far it is the least expensive suite for tomorrow night.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，这是能为明晚提供的最便宜的套房。

sentences.english: You could book a connecting room presidential suitedeluxe suite.
sentences.chinese: 您可以预定以门相隔的连房总统套房豪华套房。

definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
a mortgage (loanword via Cantonese)/to buy property on a mortgage
configuration of rooms in a residence (e.g. 3BR 2 Bath)
